get.description: API root endpoint with welcome message and links.

post.description: Manually add or update a lot in the database.

get.description: Search lots by title, brand, lot code, or EAN.
Get detailed lot information including specs and reference prices.

delete.description: Delete a lot and all related data (specs, bids, reference prices, positions).

parameters.name: auction_code

schema.description: Auction code is required to identify the lot
schema.title: Auction Code

parameters.description: Auction code is required to identify the lot

get.description: Get all reference prices for a lot.

schema.title: Response List Reference Prices Lots  Lot Code  Reference Prices Get

post.description: Add a reference price for a lot.

get.description: Get bid history for a lot, ordered by most recent first.

schema.title: Response Get Lot Bid History Lots  Lot Code  Bid History Get

post.description: Add or update a specification for a lot.

get.description: List all spec templates, optionally filtered by parent.

schema.title: Response List Spec Templates Spec Templates Get

post.description: Apply a spec template to a lot.

get.description: List all tracked positions, optionally filtered by buyer.
List recorded bids with optional filters.

post.description: Record a new bid (local only, does not submit to Troostwijk).

get.description: Get exposure and position summary for a buyer.
List all auctions, optionally including those without active lots.
Get a single auction by code.

delete.description: Delete an auction. Optionally delete all associated lots.

parameters.name: delete_lots

schema.description: Also delete all lots in this auction
schema.title: Delete Lots

parameters.description: Also delete all lots in this auction

post.description:
Analyze images for product codes, model numbers, and EAN codes.

Supports two backends:
- 'local': Uses Tesseract OCR with regex extraction (free, offline)
- 'openai': Uses GPT-4 Vision API (requires OPENAI_API_KEY)

The local backend requires pytesseract and tesseract-ocr to be installed.

get.description:
Get extracted codes pending manual review.

Returns codes that have not been auto-approved and need human review.

post.description: Approve an extracted code for promotion to lot record.
Reject an extracted code (mark as not approved).
Approve or reject multiple codes at once.

get.description: Get statistics for the review queue.
